name: Dômes
description:
When our camel is forced to leave his dried oasis to survive the desert, he has to find ways to reach the precious water he needs. On the road, thanks to a few new friends, he might find a new home.

The game doesn't contain any text so anyone can play it no matter what language they speak !

Dômes is a game we made during the Global Game Jam 2019 on the theme "What home means to you".
